post:
Hello Guys!

If you are looking for a VPS check us out over at https://sernethosting.com

We offer:
Daily Backups on all SSD VPS servers and Weekly Backups on HDD VPS servers and allow self-managed restores!

SSD VPS Servers:
These servers can be found at the below URL. Pricing has been added to the thread for convenience

https://sernethosting.com/ssd-vps.php

**SSD VPS**
2Gb  DDR3 Ram 
1GB Swap
1 Core
Intel Xeon E3-1245v2 CPU
25GB SSD Storage
Unlimited Bandwidth @ 200mb/ps

$6/mo First month just $5.40 using promo code LowEndTalk

HDD VPS Servers:
These servers can be found at the below url. Pricing has been added to the thread for convenience

https://sernethosting.com/hdd-vps.php

**HDD VPS**
2Gb  DDR3 Ram
1GB Swap
1 Core
Intel Xeon E3-1245v2 CPU
100GB HDD Storage
Unlimited Bandwidth @ 200mb/ps

$6/mo First month just $5.40 using promo code LowEndTalk

The promo code LowEndTalk is also valid on cPanel VPS servers, Storage VPS servers and web hosting along with reseller web hosting,

All our reseller plans include a free WHMCS licence among with overselling allowed, a white labelled url, Jet Backups with reseller access to restore there own accounts and pure SSD hardware!
